summary.personality: Martin comes from Slovakia. He is very communicative, hardworking and reliable man. He has excellent organizational and analytical skills.
summary.testingAutomation: He is focused especially on Cypress automation. He set up automation web and mobile applications from scratch, automated API tests using Postman and he is familiar with the SQL database. He has knowledge of the system development life cycle, he is able to prepare the test plan, implement them, prepare of test cases and test execution.

projects.title: QA Lead / QA Engineer
description: - Develop and implement quality assurance strategies, policies, and procedures specific to the transport sector
- Lead a team of QA testers, providing guidance, training, and performance evaluations
- Create test plans, test cases, and execute test scenarios to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and standards
- Monitor and analyze quality metrics, identify trends and propose corrective actions to enhance service quality and customer satisfaction
- Daily communication with representatives of the Ministry of Transportation and its affiliated departments and divisions

otherProjects.title: Founder
otherProjects.description: E-shop maintenance with top premium quality Japanese teas and accessories.
